implementation_summary.title: Add priority field to Todo for task prioritization
implementation_summary.description: Added priority field (0-3) to Todo dataclass with validation, serialization support, and set_priority() method

commands_executed: uv run ruff check src/flywheel/todo.py tests/test_issue_4148_priority_field.py
risks_limitations: Existing stored todos without priority field will default to 2 when loaded
No CLI support for priority field yet (out of scope for this issue)
